name: #SaveTheElephants
description:
Panic at the National Elephant Reserve! Poachers are swarming the wilderness, killing any elephant they see to steal their ivory. But how to buff security with dwindling finances? Desperate times call for desperate measures: what if tourism could help repel looters? The plea is soon relayed on all social media under a simple name... #SaveTheElephants

As the leader of the reserve, fight the ever-increasing numbers of poachers threatening our wonderful animal friends. Carefully manage your defenses and finances with the help of security guards and social media influencers to survive each wave of poachers.

Will you become an ecotourism tycoon or let the last wild elephant die a horrible death? In the heat of the battle, it can be easy to forget that there is often a third way...

---------

Initially made for GGJ 2022

Credits:

  • XRNZ: Code, Level Design
  • Mangatome: Code, UI
  • Paikea2: Art
